column4: intel 82801g sound on a toshiba laptop running 6.10 not working, but everything appears correct (in my noob eyes) sound is not muted, any ideas
intel 82801g sound on a toshiba laptop running 6.10 not working, but everything appears correct (in my noob eyes) sound is not muted, any ideas
is the intel_snd8x0 module loaded?
how do i check?
lsmod|grep intel and see if it says that
it says other intel things, but not that
ok try this sudo modprobe intel_snd8x0
module not found
hmm it might be in the kernel but probably not, that might be your problem but I could have gotten the module name wrong hang on a sec
ah its snd_intel8x0
its there
ok is your PCM and Master volumes high?
yes, and nothing is muted, i followed a how to on the forums with no luck
it appears like it should be working but isnt
hmm how far is your volume turned up
heres the how-to i followed http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=406676&highlight=sound+update
all the way
odd it should be working
thats what i thought, but no luck, and it worked fine before i switched from vista
try this alsamixer and see if it's low
ok do you by chance have two sound cards like one onboard and one a card maybe it's using the wrong card but if that's not it then I can't really help you but crimson knows about sound more
i dont believe i have 2
